help-desk-central-dashboard.title: Help Desk Central Dashboard
help-desk-central-dashboard.description: A web based desktop application that aggregates important call center information for agents and supervisors to be displayed in the call center.
help-desk-central-dashboard.shortDescription: Custom built agent call queue, and metrics dashboard for TAMU Technology Services
help-desk-central-dashboard.longDescription:
This innovative application revolutionizes call center management by seamlessly aggregating data from diverse platforms. It leverages web scraping to extract real-time information from Cisco Finesse (call support) and utilizes API calls to gather data from ServiceNow (email/ticket support), Bomgar (chat support), and other miscellaneous sources. This consolidated data is then presented in a unified dashboard, displayed across 4 screens in one of the largest call centers in the area. It empowers call agents and supervisors with real-time insights into call traffic and essential center metrics, promoting efficiency and informed decision-making.

This project wasn't commissioned by TAMU IT; it was born from the initiative of two student employees. This dashboard aimed to enhance call center operations and replace an outdated, cumbersome dashboard system. It exemplifies a proactive approach to problem-solving, resourcefulness in data acquisition, and a dedication to improving real-world processes.

organization-tracker.title: Organization Tracker
organization-tracker.description: Ruby on Rails application that allows you to seamlessly handle everything you need for an organization. Mass mailing, event Calendars, members, and so much more.
organization-tracker.shortDescription: Ruby on Rails application that allows you to seamlessly handle everything you need for an organization
organization-tracker.longDescription:
Developed as part of CSCE-431 (Software Engineering), this robust Ruby on Rails application offers a comprehensive suite of features. Users can seamlessly interact with events by viewing details, RSVPing, signing up, and checking in. Administrators enjoy full control over events and announcements, including creation, editing, and deletion, with the added capability of mass emailing announcements to subscribed organization members. The application's fully responsive design guarantees optimal user experience across all devices.  Moreover, administrators can generate and view insightful demographics and organization reports. 

As Project Manager, I spearheaded the development process, maintaining consistent communication with stakeholders, discussing requirements, and presenting previews to the customer to ensure the application met their evolving needs. I also diligently ensured our team adhered to tight deadlines for deliverables. This project earned recognition from the professor as one of the "best looking and well-executed projects," a testament to our team's commitment to excellence.

sharetea-point-of-sales-system.title: ShareTea Point of Sales System
sharetea-point-of-sales-system.description: Online ordering system and website for ShareTea, complete with a beautiful and modern customer interface and an advanced admin panel with statistics.
sharetea-point-of-sales-system.shortDescription: Online ordering system and website for ShareTea.
sharetea-point-of-sales-system.longDescription:
This is the second of two application created with a team of 5 for Honors CSCE-331 (Intro to Software Engineering). This project is a Next.JS web application that serves to be a customer web client for placing orders and viewing a menu. As a customer the project allows you to view the menu, place and order with topping selection, with advanced menu search. For the employee/manager, this project allows you to place customer orders, view/manage/track inventory, display a dynamic menu board for the store, view advanced sales analysis and reports and more. 

 As project lead for the project, I managed and led the development of the application. I also used my significant experience with web applications to mentor team members and tackles complex issues.

custom-authentication-platform.title: Custom Authentication Platform
custom-authentication-platform.description: An advanced fully custom proof of concept authentication platform
custom-authentication-platform.shortDescription: The financial management platform for building a budget and tracking your expenses.
custom-authentication-platform.longDescription: A modern implementation of an authentication platform focused on ease of use, appealing design, and security. The authentication process is fully custom and does not make use of any external apis or resources. This platform allows users to create an account, reset their password, and sign-in. There is also OTP generation so that when users forget their password, they can verify that they are themselves by providing a passcode that is sent to their email.

modern-maintainable-portfolio-v3.title: Modern Maintainable Portfolio-V3
modern-maintainable-portfolio-v3.description: The modern looking portfolio designed to make you say "wow" and be maintainable.
modern-maintainable-portfolio-v3.shortDescription: The financial management platform for building a budget and tracking your expenses.
modern-maintainable-portfolio-v3.longDescription:
As the third iteration of my personal website/portfolio, I sought to create a unique experience, distinct from the typical HTML Bootstrap sites or those relying on off-the-shelf UI libraries. This fully custom application embodies my vision of a personal website, prioritizing both aesthetics and maintainability.

Future updates are streamlined through several key implementations:

1. Dynamic Content: Text for work experience and projects is pulled from a JSON file, eliminating the need for hardcoded HTML changes.

2. Automated Image Integration: Project images are automatically fetched from their directory, simplifying the process of adding visuals.

3. Real-Time Updates: The "last updated" date on the homepage is automatically calculated based on the latest GitHub commit, ensuring accuracy without manual intervention.

4. Dynamic Project Pages: Project pages are generated from JSON data, eliminating the need to create and manage multiple individual pages.

These features collectively ensure that my portfolio remains effortlessly up-to-date and adaptable, allowing me to focus on showcasing my work rather than website maintenance.

budgettc.title: BudgetTC
budgettc.description: The financial management platform for building a budget and tracking your expenses.
budgettc.shortDescription: The financial management platform for building a budget and tracking your expenses.
budgettc.longDescription:
This project marked my exciting debut into the world of web development. While the code may reflect the inexperience of a beginner, comparing it to my later work showcases my significant growth. I embarked on this journey with zero knowledge of web app creation, but through dedication and perseverance, I mastered essential skills like authentication, security, database interaction, efficiency optimization, real-time connection management, and user interface design.

The invaluable lessons learned from this project extend far beyond technical skills. Though now abandoned, it taught me crucial aspects of software development like scope management, test-driven development, Firebase integration, styling, responsive design, and effective troubleshooting.

While the application's current state falls short of my current organizational standards, its sheer scale and ambition stand as a testament to my unwavering commitment to learning and self-improvement—a driving force behind my success as a software engineer.

sharetea-cashier-system.title: ShareTea Cashier System
sharetea-cashier-system.description: A lightweight and efficient cashier system for processing orders and managing inventory for ShareTea.
sharetea-cashier-system.shortDescription: A lightweight cashier system for processing orders and managing inventory
sharetea-cashier-system.longDescription:
This is one of two applications created with a team of 5 for honors CSCE-331 (Intro to Software Engineering). This application is a lightweight user interface that interacts with an AWS postgresSQL database to provide cashiers with a way to place customer orders. This GUI also allows the manager to view/track/manage store inventory and look generate important sales reports. 

 As project lead for the project, I managed and led the development of the application and help to train other members and tackle issues with my prior experience in JAVA development.

budgettc-java.title: BudgetTC Java
budgettc-java.description: A lightweight financial management software that allows you to build a budget and track expenses.
budgettc-java.shortDescription: A lightweight financial management software that allows you to build a budget and track expenses.
budgettc-java.longDescription:
This project was created with the intention to learn how to make an application. It represents my first foray into GUI and was made completely custom without any GUI builder. I built it with Java Swing and Java; It incorporates the ideas of object oriented programing, encapsulation and inheritance.

 It features the ability to make a budget for expenses and income, import the expenses and income from a bank account via CSV, and then track it. It also incorporates series of investment calculators.

cloud-condo-3d.title: Cloud Condo 3D
cloud-condo-3d.description: An elaborately modeled 3D High-Rise Luxury condo in the skies of Kuala Lumpur implemented with home automation features.
cloud-condo-3d.shortDescription: An elaborately modeled 3D luxury condo implemented with home automation features.
cloud-condo-3d.longDescription:
I will probably never do 3D modeling as a profession, but this is here to show you that I am incredibly open minded and able to learn almost anything with excitement. This project is the result of lots of dedication and hundreds of hours of painstaking 3d modeling and intelligent design to make things come together. I learned a lot about developing textures, 3d modeling, and rendering efficiency. 
 This project also includes experimental automation features (For example, you can trigger lights via a keyboard or motion).

modern-getaway.title: Modern Getaway
modern-getaway.description: A series of elaborately detailed modern homes and mansions built in Sketchup and visualized in Twinmotion
modern-getaway.shortDescription: A series of elaborately detailed modern homes and mansions
modern-getaway.longDescription: I will probably never do 3D modeling as a profession, but this is here to show you that I am incredibly open minded and able to learn almost anything with excitement. This project is the result of lots of dedication and hundreds of hours of painstaking 3d modeling and intelligent design to make things come together. To pay respects to the incredible amount of hours I spent on developing this, please take a look at the home on Twinmotion cloud below.

tamu-cybersecurity-student-tracking-syst.title: TAMU CyberSecurity Student Tracking System
tamu-cybersecurity-student-tracking-syst.description: A modern student tracking and reporting tool tailored to the needs of the TAMU Cybersecurity Club
tamu-cybersecurity-student-tracking-syst.shortDescription: A modern student tracking and reporting tool
tamu-cybersecurity-student-tracking-syst.longDescription:
Developed for CSCE-331 (Database Systems), this custom-built PHP, HTML, and CSS application showcases meticulous database design with ERDs and normalization techniques. The impressive feat of completing over 7,000 lines of code in just over a week further underscores its robust development.

Designed specifically for the Texas A&M Cyber Security club, this application empowers members to create and manage applications, profiles, internship history, and more. Administrators gain comprehensive control over member information, complex report generation, and event management. The application's fully custom authentication, independent of any external providers, further highlights its tailored security implementation.
